name: Igor (Ninety)
description:
"Igor? It's Steve. You're still coming in today, right? You'd better not be late again, buddy."

A short puzzle-platformer that revolves around gaining and losing world-altering rules. Spikes become harmless, balloons become deadly, and even gravity itself will be at your control as you guide Igor along his treacherous commute to work.

Igor was made for the 38th GMC Jam (and it won!). This version is almost identical to the original, but I've fixed a few bugs and level design problems.
